text: Hianagi anama zamahe fri'za vahe'mokizmi mofavre nagara zamahe ofri'naze. Na'ankure Ra Anumzamo'ma Mosese'ma asamigeno kasege avontafepima krente'neana, nefa'ma hu'nesia kumitera mofavre'a ahe ofrisigeno, mofavre'amo'ma hu'nesia kumitera nefana ahe ofrigahie. Hianagi magoke magokemo'ma agra'ama hu'nesia kumite zamahe fritere hugahaze hu'ne.
